nodes.text: Rancor Wrestling was an arcade game, that could be played in the Raging Rancor Cantina, a Rancor-themed cantina that was located on Genarius.

The game was set in an area resembling a kitchen or warehouse, where players would have to lure a baby rancor into a walk-in cooler, without hurting it. They would then have to lock the door, to complete the game. Xav Verivax held the high score for the Rancor Wrestling game in the Raging Rancor cantina.
